label: 七仏薬師
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: Though separately identified in the Seven Healing Buddhas Sutra, the first six of the Seven Healing Buddhas were treated as manifestations of the seventh, Yakushi (rurikō) nyorai (Bhaisajya-guru [vaidūryaprabha-] thatāgata), the lord of the Eastern Paradise (p. 513). [薬師瑠璃光如来]
